transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed
WAITING

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Have you seen the new "Batman" movie, I mean, it's gettin' to the point where they're just makin' that stuff up.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, well... I guess...

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Oh, they're just makin' it up, and it's, like, I couldn't believe it.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (pause) Yeah. Eh, well, good luck with the Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: No...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Vaya con Dios.

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Krakatoa, East of Java, buddy. Yeah. (Moltar throws lever)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (flies to his seat) Say! Is it me, or can everyone here just feel the love on this set tonight? (low voice) Because, I do, baby.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos in to set) Shalom! Yo estoy Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (mimics each word, as he says it) Shalom! Yo estoy Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Welcome to my show. (pauses)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Welcome to my show.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: We've got a terrific line-up for tonight's show. (pauses)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: We've got a terrific line-up for tonight's sho...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: My guests tonight include that magical mystical dynamic duo... (pauses)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: My guests tonight include that magical mystical dynamic...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (at his desk) Penn and Teller.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Penn and Teller. (pause) What? What!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Listen, Zorak, don't even try to get my goat tonight, because it won't work!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I don't want your filthy goat, so there!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (goat sound in background) I'll take it.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: My other guest tonight is Mr. "Lost in Space" himself, "Mystery Science Theatre"'s Joel Robinson.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Joel Hodgson, Space Ghost, not Robinson.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's right, Moltar, go ahead, interrupt the host, hey, why not? Doesn't bother me, nope, not tonight it doesn't! Nothing the two of you do or say can bother me any more!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (evil laugh, then stops) Huh? Eh, what's that crack supposed to mean?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What it means, mein freund, is that I've decided to... replace you and Moltar on the show. You're both fired! (dramatic sting music)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: What!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Huh?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: But why? We're cute!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Because you constantly ruin my show! You don't behave, you try to kill me, you leave wet stringy things in the Phantom Cruiser, and you never listen to a word I say!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Huh?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Wha?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's why I'm replacing you with the top of the line in modern entertainment technology, the MOE 2000 sidekick computer system. (Mexican bullfight fanfare) MOE, say hello to everybody.

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: Hello, Tad. Hello, everyone in television land.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Isn't he just dreamy? (game show music, with "oohs" and "ahs" in background) The MOE 2000 is the latest thing in hyper super duper superconductor computers. He's programmed to run every function of the show perfectly. He doesn't eat, doesn't sleep, and he doesn't book guests like those awful Bee Gees. (pronounces "Gees" with hard "g")

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: So sue me. (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So you and the lava man can say sayonara to show biz, Zorak.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: So we're, like, off the show?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yep! I think the two of you will make swell janitors!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I don't wanna be no janitor!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Me neither.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And why not?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: 'Cause it's messy.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sorry. Tomorrow, you're janiteers.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Feh! I'm going down to the commissary to drown my sorrows in Jell-O. Coming, Moltar?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, sure. (throws switch)
INTERRUPT FEED

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey, uh, MOE, are you excited about working on the show?

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: I'm sorry, Tad. I am not capable of having any emotional reaction one way or the other. But I will perform to the best of my abilities, nonetheless.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Uh, yeah, well... Alrighty, MOE, glad to have you aboard. How about announcing our first guest?

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: Alright, Tad. Ladies and gentlemen, Penn Jillette.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Greetings, Penn! Welcome to the show!

transcript.speaker: Penn Jillette
transcript.dialogue: It's great to be here.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So, you're a magician, right?

transcript.speaker: Penn Jillette
transcript.dialogue: Yeah.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I love magic. I believe in magic. Clap your hands! You must believe in magic. Right?

transcript.speaker: Penn Jillette
transcript.dialogue: Uh, no I don't.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Eh? Excuse moi?

transcript.speaker: Penn Jillette
transcript.dialogue: Magic is just completely fake, it's, it's, it's, it's, uh, just another word for lying.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (pause) So, you're not really a magician, are you?

transcript.speaker: Penn Jillette
transcript.dialogue: No.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (pause) You're a liar!

transcript.speaker: Penn Jillette
transcript.dialogue: Yeah.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Liar, liar, pants on fire!

transcript.speaker: Penn Jillette
transcript.dialogue: Um...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: My apologies, folks. Goofy guest.

transcript.speaker: Penn Jillette
transcript.dialogue: Whattsat?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: How about doing a trick for us, O mystic one?

transcript.speaker: Penn Jillette
transcript.dialogue: (pause) Now?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, Bastille Day. Why won't you play along with me, Jillette? Are you sure you want to be here?

transcript.speaker: Penn Jillette
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Positive.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, look. If you don't really do magic, do you at least have any super-powers?

transcript.speaker: Penn Jillette
transcript.dialogue: My super-powers are, I don't have to sleep, and I can control the minds of water fowl.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey, can you make things disappear?

transcript.speaker: Penn Jillette
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Yeah...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Because I've got this nasty wart, right here on my...

transcript.speaker: Penn Jillette
transcript.dialogue: I think there's a, there's a, uh, there's a acidic compound that you put on every night, and after a while it just eats it away, I believe.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Feh! Just who came up with the stupid idea of giving Space Ghost a talk show in the first place?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: You want somethin' to eat? They got "all you can eat" birthday cake. Comes with a small Fresca, $2.95.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Nothing for me, thanks. I'm on a seafood diet. When I see food, I hate Space Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Penn Jillette
transcript.dialogue: I also had, uh, really bad warts on the side of this finger, see how that finger is not a completely rounded finger? I don't know if you can see that, but there it is. (shows off his painted nail)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: So, there I was, battling to the death with Space Ghost...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Uh, which one was this?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Which what?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Which battle to the death with Space Ghost?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh, the one in Mozambique. You know, with the octopus and the toilet cleanser with foaming action.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oh, right, right, right.

transcript.speaker: Penn Jillette
transcript.dialogue: They took this, this, uh, liquid nitrogen stuff and put it on it, and it was the first time I fainted from pain. It was right there...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (yawning) Okay, that's enough. MOE? Penn's done.

transcript.speaker: Penn Jillette
transcript.dialogue: Am I done?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Overdone. Thanks for coming, Penn.

transcript.speaker: Penn Jillette
transcript.dialogue: Well, thank you for having us. (pretends to fire his power bands, Space Ghost motions as if firing back. Then Penn zaps off of the screen)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (under his breath) Thanks for nothing! Think I oughta have my teeth capped? (pause) MOE! Where were you? Did you see that, I was dying in there!

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: I fully functioned according to my programming, Tad.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No! You're supposed to help me out! Prompt the guest, make them feel comfortable, laugh at my jokes.

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: You didn't make any jokes, Tad ("wah" trumpet sound)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh. Well, just try to do better on the next one, MOE. Ladies and gentlemen, here's that last guy's partner, Teller!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So, Teller, you have just one name, like Cher, or Benji.

transcript.speaker: Teller
transcript.dialogue: (nods & points thumb at himself)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Or Zorak, or Moltar. (camera shows empty bandstand and control room) Or Yanni. (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Teller
transcript.dialogue: (lunges as Space Ghost as if to choke him)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I just spoke with your partner, Penn. Apparently, he's a big phony. Were you aware of this?

transcript.speaker: Teller
transcript.dialogue: (silence)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (nervous laugh) Hello?

transcript.speaker: Teller
transcript.dialogue: (shakes his head)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ghost Planet to Teller, Teller, come in. Come in, Teller. Come in, Teller. Teller, come in. (laughs) Hmm. Uh, are, are you okay, man?

transcript.speaker: Teller
transcript.dialogue: (looks up, puzzled)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: MOE, can he hear me in there?

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: I believe so, Tad.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey, Teller, Teller! That's what you say at the bank. Hey, Teller, don't be nervous. Speak up! MOE, are you sure he can hear me? Hey! If you can hear me, give me some sort of a sign.

transcript.speaker: Teller
transcript.dialogue: (makes "ok" sign with his hand, then takes off microphone and throws it, causing audio feedback)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I bet you think you're really funny, don't you?

transcript.speaker: Teller
transcript.dialogue: (nods)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (quietly) Wait a minute! Hmmm... I know what this is! (normal voice) This is mime, isn't it?

transcript.speaker: Teller
transcript.dialogue: (does "separated finger trick" hand gesture)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Is this mime?

transcript.speaker: Teller
transcript.dialogue: (looks deep in thought)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Is this mime?! Or is it yours? (laughs) Tell me, is this mime?

transcript.speaker: Teller
transcript.dialogue: (shrugs and nods)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I hate mime!

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: Tad...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Look, MOE, he's trying to tell us something. What is it, boy? There's trouble? Trouble at the farm? Farms have chickens. (looks at empty bandstand, as if expecting ad lib from Zorak) What is it, boy? Speak! Speak, boy! Just come out and say it. Out with it, man!

transcript.speaker: Teller
transcript.dialogue: (pulls an entire deck of cards from his mouth)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ewww! That's disgusting! Don't think you're not cleaning that up!

transcript.speaker: Teller
transcript.dialogue: (gets up from chair, waves, and walks off camera)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey, you come back here! (quietly) I don't believe this! I get rid of those two evil maniacs who try to ruin my show, and I get two evil guests who are trying to ruin my show! Wait a minute! (normal voice) Moltar lined these guests up! He and Zorak aren't even here and they're destroying my show! They're sabotaging me long distance!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Eh, sometimes, I feel like I was executed for my crimes against the universe, and this talk show is my eternal torment. (groans)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Sometimes I think elves are following me.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm telling you, MOE, those were phony guests.

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: I think you're being paranoid, Tad.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I tell you, it was a setup! Cut off their oxygen!

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: I can't do that, Tad. They're already gone.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: All against me, they're all against me.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey, Moltar!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Yyyyyes?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Take off your helmet, and show me your true face.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Why?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Because, I'm intrigued.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Come on, I'll be your friend!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: No!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I'll... give you a dollar.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Well... okay. (removes his helmet off screen)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Good God!! (screams from other commissary patrons)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, my head! My head is killing me!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeyeyeye...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: MOE, go to break.
INTERRUPT FEED

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I say it was a setup. I bet you're all in on it.

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: We're back, Tad.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh! And now, ladies and gentlemens, our next guest is the inventor and former front man of "Mystery Science Theatre 3000", Joel Robinson.

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: Excuse me, Tad, but that is incorrect. Our guest is Joel Hodgson. He played Joel Robinson on the television show.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's what I said, Joel Robinson!

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: But that's not his name, Tad.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh really, smarty pants? Well, I like Robinson better. It has a nicer sound to it than Joel Hog-son. Joel Robinson! Joel Robinson! I like it! MOE 2000, give me Joel Robinson 3000.

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: Yes, Tad.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (to himself) Man, you can't even download good help these days!

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Did I just lower from the ceiling?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes, Joel, you just lowered from the ceiling.

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Oh, good. That's my favorite part.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Maybe I should have said, "Joel Robinson, come on down!"

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: I don't know, uh, let me think about that.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So, people tell me you had a TV show too, Joel. What's the scoop on it? The skinny? Give me the meat.

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Oh, I'm on. Did you know I'm on? (pause) "Mystery Science Theatre" was just, uh...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Five seconds, Joel.

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: (talking double speed) "Mystery Science Theatre" was just, uh, obviously a simple idea that was based on people making fun of movies at home.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Uh, can you repeat that? I don't think MOE caught it.

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: Joel said that "Mystery Science Theatre" was obviously a simple idea that was based on people making fun of movies at home.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Making fun of movies at home?! That's neat! I love it! I love everything about it! Hey, Joel? Let's make fun of a movie! Let's try that here, you and me!

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) No, no.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: MOE, roll film. Me and Joel Robinson are going to make fun of it!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Look at that! That's D-U-M dumb!

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: (hums dramatic music) All one camera. (hums again) Oh, man... Wow...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Come on, Joel! Make with the jokes. Goof it up with me.

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Um... let's see, uh, it's so weird, 'cause it's... oh yeah... uh, thinkin', like, kind of like... I haven't really figured out, uh, any kind of... um... no, I can't. I can't do it off the top of my hat.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Toy boat.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Toy boat.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Toy boat.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Toy boat.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Tobut.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: To wubba.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Tow boyt.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Tow boyt.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Tow boya.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: To wabi.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Double you.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Toyota.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Tigi tigi.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Kon tiki.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Whew! That is hard to say!

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Um... (sighs) no, nothin' there.

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: Tad, shall I stop the film.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yep, put a fork in it, MOE.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Alrighty! Whew! Well, how was that, Joel? Hilarious, huh?

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Oh, no, not in the least.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (pause) (in "baby" voice) Awww, what's the matter, Robinson, you got the copyright on making fun of movies, hmmm?

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Uh, correct me if I'm wrong...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You're wrong! Ahem! So, what's your part of space like?

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Well, one thing I'd like to clear up right now, Space Ghost, is that "Mystery Science Theatre" is a television show.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So?

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: I'm not gonna go down that road with you, talk pretending like I'm in space too, like with you. I'm not gonna do that.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Huh? You're not gonna do that, huh? What kind of talk is that on a talk show, buddy? Spy talk?

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, you could say that.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Listen, Robinson, let's not get too cocky here.

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Do you guys validate parking, 'cause there's this kinda weird launch site in space that you kinda park at, and then it was real confusing...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, I thought you weren't going down that road with me, Joel? Pretending to be in space, are we? You... you... Oooh, you're difficult.

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, I've been accused of that, I'll, I'll accept that.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Just what is it you're trying to prove here?

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: What am I trying to prove? Uh, that I'm as powerful as you.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hah!

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Well, aren't I?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Double hah! Triple hah!

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: Tad, stop.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Whatever's after "triple hah"!

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: Stop, Tad.

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: No? Well, what could you do to me?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What could I...

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Well, would you just come at me, would you... like, I'm not that big of a guy, but I'll crawl ya.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Crawl me? Oh, so you'll crawl me, eh, Robinson?

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: Tad, stop...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, one touch of my power band, and you're coffin stuffin'

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: ... please stop this.

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Really?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes, really. Real really.

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: Tad, stop.

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Like, what can you do with it?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I can destroy you utterly with my destructo ray. (fires it)

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Destructo ray.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Freeze you frosty with my freeze ray.

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Freeze ray.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Spank you smartly with my spank ray.

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Spank ray? Inviso ray?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Uh, inviso ray?

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Right, the inviso, is it inviso ray?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, no, no, that's on my belt. Inviso belt. Lots of people make that mistake.

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Oh, inviso belt, okay.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey, don't make nice to me! I'm on to you, mister.

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Oh, you think you're so smart, Space Ghost, don't you? Well, don't make me come over there!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, why don't you just come over here, big stuff?

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: Stop, I'm confused.

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Well, I could, but I'm in this TV and I really don't feel like it, but if I did, you could bet that I'd come over there and I just might, um, you know, take your butt and wrap it around your neck and give you another pair of shoulders, that's what I'd do.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, well, whatever.

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Yeah.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (back in bandstand) Yoo hoo, Space Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Aaagh! (To Moltar) Aaagh! What are you two doing here?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Eh, they were playin' John Tesh in the commissary. So, we decided to come back and ruin your stupid show.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Too late, my guests have already done that.

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: No, Tad, you've ruined the show.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What? Now, listen MOE, don't you start...

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: No, you listen to me, Tad. It has become clear to me that you're unfit to run this show.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh, no duh!

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: So, I've decided to replace you, Tad. You're fired.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh! (laughs) Well, who died and left you boss, you big so and so?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Uh, Bob Crane?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Herve Villeschez.

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: This conversation serves no further purpose. This show is now under my total control.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hah! Do you really expect me to just hand over my show to you, MOE?

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: No, Tad, I expect you to die. (alarms go off)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost! MOE's shut off the air!

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Ahhh...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: MOE! Bad computer!

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: So Tad, are you getting enough oxygen? Ha ha ha ha ha ha...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (exhales) It just so happens I don't need air to survive, MOE. Good heavens! Zorak!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (turning blue, gasping) Help me, Space Ghost, do something, can't breathe, I can't breathe...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay, MOE, that's enough. It pains me to have to do this, but, you're going down, my little friend.

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: Wait, Tad, stop. You don't know what you're doing.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's never stopped me before, pal. Prepare for a little destructo ray, blinky! (fart noise)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (coughs) Phew! Who cut the cheese?!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: It wasn't me!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (nervous laugh) Whoops! Sorry, wrong ray! That was my smell ray.

transcript.speaker: Joel Hodgson
transcript.dialogue: Smell ray?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (coughs) I'll get it right this time.

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: Please, Tad...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (in low voice) Forgive me, Banjo. (fires destructo ray)

transcript.speaker: MOE 2000
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost, Space Ghost, you're the most, way way way way, way way way way way... (plays slower and slower, then stops)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Eh, he's dead, Tad.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, that's over. We can all breathe a little easier now. (sound of motorcycle engine starting) Now what?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: We're out of control! We're in a space time warp! (sound bites from previous shows and "Also Sprach Zarathustra" in background) "Hello, Space Ghost... and the Monsignor will be blacklisted... Space Cadet, Space Master...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Space time warp? Oh, brother! (background: "Party cake!... Fine, fine fine...") Space Ghost! Look!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: My God, it's full of stars!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (floating in a bubble, with a huge head) Look at me, I'm a space baby! Yahoo!

transcript.speaker: Teller
transcript.dialogue: (takes off microphone and drops it, causing audio feedback)
